title: David Gauke – 2011 Speech to the Financial Executive Network Group
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech by David Gauke, the Exchequer Secretary to the Treasury, at the Financial Executive Network Group, on 27th January 2011.

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London

  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
